Price: $21.99 - $14.02
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:08:27 UTC – Details)


It should be easy to name 3 breeds of dogs—but can you do it under the pressure of 5 seconds twisting down, and with the other players staring at you, waiting for you to get flustered? time’s not on your side, so just say what comes to mind and risk ridiculous answers slipping out as time twirls down on the unique twisted timer! it’s all in good fun with this fast-paced game where you have to just Spit it out! for 3 or more players. Includes 576 questions on 288 cards, 5-second twisted marble timer, rules
EASY TO PLAY – Pick a card, read the seemingly easy topic, then start the timer! now with only 5 seconds to name 3 things that fit the topic, it doesn’t seem so easy!
JUST SPIT IT OUT – Players get tongue-tied, funny answers come flying out and laughter is sure to follow in this fast-paced game
CLASSIC TIMER – The twisted timer makes a fun “zoooooop!” sound as the marbles race down, tracking the 5 seconds!
MORE FUN – Includes 576 questions on 288 cards for extended fun
GAME NIGHT FRIENDLY – For 3 or more players, ages 10 to adult; great for game nights with friends, family, or ice breakers

Read more

Your next gathering will be a hit with 5 Second Rule!

There’s 5 seconds on the timer for you to name the 3 things listed on the card.

Can you name 3 breeds of dogs? Can you name 3 finger foods? That’s easy! Well, not quite! 5 Second Rule is the seemingly simple game that gets players tongue-tied as the timer moves and other players are waiting for your answers. Say what comes to mind and some ridiculous answers will pop out. 5 Second Rule will have everyone laughing!

Read more

Simple topics? Sure. . . but in 5 seconds.

Name 3 flavors of ice cream. Name 3 professional football teams. Name 3 Olympic cities. Name 3 animals you wouldn’t want as a pet. These topics are quite simple to answer but not as 5 seconds tick away!

The Twisted Timer is Zoooooper Fun!

5 Second Rule’s twisted timer adds another element of fun with its zoooooop sound. Don’t let it be a distraction as the balls slide down to mark your 5-second turn.

Read more





Brain F*rt
Utter Nonsense
The Game of THINGS…
TAG
The Logo Game
5 Second Rule Jr.
Game Play The giant cubes give you categories, and the brain timer gives you a letter–now take turns naming things in those categories that start with that letter! But hurry before the timer farts! Read silly phrases in different voices and accents–the funniest wins! Pick a topic, write a response, and guess who said what! Real-time elimination game! Trivia about all your favorite brands! Just like 5 Second Rule, but for the family and kids!
Ages 14+ 8+ 14+ 14+ 12+ 6+

Elevates performance with a premium liquid metal compound on the CPU, features direct CPU contact, a wide degree of open ventilation, and a smart fan that efficiently spins up when required to effectively transfer heat directly out the system for quiet and cool performance.

Package & Other Functions: 1x HX90 Mini PC, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x HDMI Cable, 1x Power Adapter, 1x Instruction Manual. Functions: RTC wake up / Wake on Lan / Auto Power on / Network boot.24/7 Support, professional technical team.

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) IRIS plastic airtight container combo includes one 33 quart sealed storage container, two 12 quart sealed storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop and one set of wheels for your pet food storage needs. The sealed storage container features a foam seal and snaps lock latches to keep pet ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $36.99 - $31.44
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:59:37 UTC – Details)


IRIS plastic airtight container combo includes one 33 quart sealed storage container, two 12 quart sealed storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop and one set of wheels for your pet food storage needs. The sealed storage container features a foam seal and snaps lock latches to keep pet food fresh and keep pests or moisture out. Designed as pet food bins, these BPA free airtight storage bins offer many other uses as well, such as leash and toy storage, pellet storage, grain storage, birdseed storage, cat litter storage, or even as a charcoal container. The small food storage bin neatly stacks on top of the large one, and the translucent bodies allow content levels to be checked at a glance. This airtight pet food container combo is versatile, functional, and the wheels allow for easy mobility between any areas in the house. The 33QT Container Holds up to 25LBS of dry pet food and 12QT Container Holds up to 10LBS of dry pet food or treat.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.5 x 10.83 x 24.5 inches; 4.58 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 500090
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 11, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ IRIS USA, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08WH8BY8Y
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CONTENTS: 10 Lbs / 12 Qt storage container stacks on the 25 Lbs / 33 Qt storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop, and one set of wheels. Included scoop makes measuring food easy and attachable casters make it easy to roll it from the storage area to your dog or cat bowl.
CLEAR CONTAINER BODY: The translucent body allows you to check the food level in just one glance. Quickly check the remaining amount before you head to the pet store.
DIFFERENT COLORS: Check out the different color containers to store your cute friend’s kibbles, pellets, seeds, and treats.
MADE IN USA: Produced by a Japanese company. Made in the USA. Used all around the world. BPA Free & FDA Compliant. Safe for you and your flurry friend.
DIMENSIONS: 16.50″L x 10.83″W x 18.63″H

From the brand

Who Are We?

SUBMATCHES was founded in 2013, Focus on household goods, research and development, design, production, sales, e-commerce operation and industrial chain system construction, provide one-stop home storage tools for people all over the world, helping people improve their living environment, improve the efficiency of living space utilization, and create a warm and comfortable home and office environment

Unique & Creative Organizer

Best-Selling Storage Bins

Best-Selling Desk Organizer

Our Mission

Delivering a sophisticated home lifestyle, enhance the happiness of home life of hundreds of millions of families.

Make Your Home More Neat, Minimalist and Comfortable

Selected the best designers in the industry to find the product design that connects life and art, selected luxury materials, set up high quality and advanced production workshops, and strictly control quality standards.

User Experience Comes First

Create more life experience of user value, continue to meet the user’s pursuit of beauty with creative and unique design, to create a sophisticated life

【STRONG SELF-ADHESIVE DRAWER】 The hidden drawer under desk can apply to various occasions such as office,kitchen, living room, bedroom, study rooms, dressing rooms. Due to the transparent plastic, it’s easy to access whatever you need at a glance. Help to organize your desk and save space. Convenient to clean it as well.
【STRONG LOAD BEARING】The desk drawer attachment is able to bear weight up to about 11lbs and withstand for years of daily use . No worry about falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can be repeatedly attached to the underside of desk and slide open/close pretty smoothly.
【LARGER CAPACITY】 The dimension of 2-layers desk drawer organizer is 9.25X7.95X6.1inch, so it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like calculators, pencils, books, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels, etc. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.
【EASY TO INSTALL】 Drill& hole- free self-adhesive under desk drawer is easy to install on smooth wall with two tapes. It perfectly protects your desk or closet from damaging. It arrives with two adhesive strips, press the adhesive tape a bit make sure the tape adheres strongly to the surface.
【SUPERIOR QUALITY】 Under desk drawer slide out is made of environmental-friendly ABS+benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant, water proof and dust-proof.BETTER USE IT AFTER 24 HOURS FOR BETTER ADHESIVE EFFECT, IF IT WAS BROKEN WHEN YOU RECEIVE OR FELL OFF AFTER APPLY IT, PLS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US, WE WILL REFUND YOUR MONEY OR SEND NEW ONE.

Production

  • The self-adhesive storage drawer underneath desk is widely applicable in living room, office, study room, kitchen, bathroom, etc.
  • Large capacity with double layers is ideal to hold a large amount of items as you like, easy and quick to grab what you need inside. Perfect to declutter your desk and won’t take up desktop space.
  • Superior material allows you to place heavy items without falling off, durable and sturdy for years, water proof and dust-proof as well. The smooth surface will not hurt your hands.
  • It is a easy and smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

The hidden drawer pencil tray is very convenient for the underside of the table, paste them anywhere as you need to hold various items.

Bedroom

  • Our hidden self-adhesive drawer helps you organize your underwear, socks and so on.
  • It prevents dust from entering inside, much more clean and healthy to your healthy.

Study Room

  • You can easily spot whatever you want inside at a glance due to its transparency.
  • Greatly save your time to get your work completed.

Office

  • No need digging. No messy any more on your desk or closet.
  • This is a smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

Large Capacity

With two layers, and even two packs as you need, it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like not only calculators, pencils, books, staplers, notes, but also eyeglasses, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels and so on. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.

Unique Features

Load Bearing Capacity

Our product is able to bear weight up to about 10lbs and withstand for years of daily use .

No worry falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can still attach and slide in and out pretty smoothly without issues.

  • [Free Drills] Attached securely and easily! No need to drill holes into the desk with no-tracing pasting.
  • [Easy Installation] Just peel the top paper off and attach. Make sure the surface you’re attaching it to is flat and clean, and the space under desk is spacious enough to hold it.
  • [ high quality] Made of ABS+ benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant and water proof and dust-proof.

Read more

Installation Step

Step One

(Before installation, wipe the wet, oil, dirt, wax and other items on the desktop before sticking it)

Peel off the surface layer of the tape

Step Two

Paste double sided tapes on the back and press hard on it.

Step Three

Peel off the surface layer of each tape

Step Four

Paste the back side of the tape to the smooth bottom of the desk. Press up a little bit. Better use it after 24 hours for better effect.

Read more
